stories.tease: When it comes to sanitizing lyrics, where does Kidz Bop draw the line? (This was pre-WAP though; now all bets are off.)
Using baby name data, we found the names that could be at risk of becomming future "Karens" in 10, 20, and 30 years.

author.name: Sara Stoudt
author.bio: is a statistician and aspiring data journalist. When she isnâ€™t data wrangling, she loves reading, brunching, and crafting the perfect playlist.
